From: grei@... <grei@...>

Date: Friday, July 02, 1999 2:03 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Mail Runs and a L50 (SPOILER)


>From: grei@...
>
>> Asking Ton Twostring (Freeport) about "agents" will get you a list of
names
>> of agents who report to Felisity Starbright (Freeport). If you ask
Felisity
>> about each of those agents by name, she'll tell you where they are. Here
are
>> her answers:
>>
>> Dark Deathsinger - Innothule
>> Silna Songsmith - Rivervale
>> Travis Two-Tone - Nektulos
>> Drizda Tunesinger - The Ferrot
>>
>> Mannerism (on The Rathe)
>
>Which makes me wonder if the Kelethin to Freeport run really works since
>I did that this morning to no effect. Of course, I haven't made up my
>mind if the problem is this or the fact everytime I've zoned from OOT
>back to Freeport on the boat, my 'puter has crashed.
>
>Grei
>Bristlebane
>
>--


The bard in Rivervale gives you a letter for the female bard in
Freeport. Did it this morning and got 9g for it
